explains: adj. 反应迟钝的；无反应的

sentences.en: Mary arrived at the hospital to find her grandmother very weak and unresponsive.
sentences.cn: 玛丽到医院时发现她的祖母很虚弱，反应迟钝。

sentences.en: I found her in a coma, totally unresponsive.
sentences.cn: 我发现她昏迷了，完全没有反应。

sentences.en: He was totally unresponsive to the needs of the majority of the population.
sentences.cn: 他对大多数人民的需求完全没有反应。
